Package fr.sii.ogham.template.freemarker.adapter

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    TemplateLoaderAdapter
    Adapter that provides the FreeMarker specific TemplateLoader from the general ResourceResolver.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractFreeMarkerTemplateLoaderOptionsAdapter
    Abstract class to handle options configuration for the adapted TemplateLoader.
    ClassPathResolverAdapter
    Adapter that converts general ClassPathResolver into FreeMarker specific ClassTemplateLoader.
    FileResolverAdapter
    Adapter that converts general FileResolver into FreeMarker specific FileTemplateLoader.
    FirstSupportingResolverAdapter
    Decorator that will ask each resolver adapter if it is able to handle the template resolver.
    StringContentTemplateLoader
    Ogham special implementation to handle template that is directly provided as string.
    StringResolverAdapter
    Adapter that converts general StringResourceResolver into FreeMarker specific StringContentTemplateLoader.
